title: United Kingdom Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in the United Kingdom decreased to 187.20 percent in 2021 from 212.20 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in the United Kingdom averaged 205.17 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 239.50 percent in 2008 and a record low of 155.80 percent in 1996. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
